snippet: Germany and Austria called on Greece to tighten its immigration controls, saying that other countries in the European Union may otherwise be forced to reinstate border checks.
abstract: Germany and Austria call on Greece to tighten immigration controls at its border with Turkey, saying that other countries in the European Union may be forced to reinstate border checks if the Greek government fails to act.
lead_paragraph: Germany and Austria called on Greece to tighten its immigration controls, saying that other countries in the European Union may otherwise be forced to reinstate border checks.

headline.seo: Germany and Austria Call on Greece to Tighten Immigration Controls
headline.main: Greece: Tighten Your Border, or Else
headline.print_headline: Greece: Tighten Your Border, or Else
